Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Colorado in 2019...
Traded from Colorado to Houston on 3/2/2019 (Going to COL: 2B Corey Hagerman. Going to HOU: P Brian Stegman)...
Injured on 6/17/2020 with a Stiff Elbow, out for 2-3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/21/2021...
Injured on 8/4/2021 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 9/3/2021, off Lesley Simoneau (CHI)...
Injured on 7/23/2022 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/2023 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/4/2026 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $964,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2027, winning 2 games with a 1.20 ERA...
1/31/2028: Gets a new one-year contract worth $964,286 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Colorado on 5/7/2028.
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/23/2029 to a 1-year deal worth $17,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/7/2030 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
